title: Review of UNICOIN: War on Crypto & Future of Money, a book by Alex Konanykhin
description: In a market seeking regulatory trust, Unicoin was penalized for doing everything right.
content:
Alex would have been happy with a quiet life, but that's not what Alex got.
Over the years, literature on cryptocurrency leans toward either dystopian fear mongering or idealistic evangelism, but so… [+5632 chars]
